text: Pedro Henrique Parreira Alves Caipiro (born 14 January 1987) is a Portuguese football player who plays for Sintrense. ==Club career== He made his professional debut in the Segunda Liga for Atlético CP on 11 August 2013 in a game against Sporting B. ==References== ==External links== Category:1987 births Category:People from Loures Category:Living people Category:Portuguese footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Clube Oriental de Lisboa players Category:C.D. title: Pedro Caipiro
